p: A = 2C 44 /(C 11 -C 12), which is obtained from the second order elastic stiffness constants. In the studied HEA, the anisotropy factor as obtained from the MD simulation was found to be between 2.15–2.26, indicating a lower elastic strain energy along <1 0 0> directions. The elastic stiffness constants of the constitutive elements of the HEA and the alloy average structure as calculated from MD simulation are compared with experimental results in Table 1.
